issues.description: 'above current stock price' - how far above not defined
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Strike price 5% above current stock price, rounded to nearest standard strike'

issues.title: Option expiration period not specified
issues.description: 'standard expiration dates' - weekly, monthly, quarterly not specified
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Monthly options expiring on third Friday of each month, 30-45 days to expiration at initiation'

issues.title: 'If necessary' roll criteria not defined
issues.description: When to roll vs let assignment occur not specified
issues.suggested_fix: Define: 'Roll if option in-the-money by <$2 at 5 days before expiration. Otherwise allow assignment'

issues.title: Assignment handling not detailed
issues.description: 'called away' handling - timing of replacement not specified
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Upon assignment, replacement position established within 2 trading days. New call sold when replacement position established'

issues.title: Early assignment handling not addressed
issues.description: Options can be assigned early (dividend capture) - handling not specified
issues.suggested_fix: Add: 'If early assignment occurs, follow standard assignment procedure. Monitor for high early assignment risk before ex-dividend dates'

issues.title: Option contract quantity not specified
issues.description: How many calls to sell per 100 shares not defined (1:1, partial coverage, etc.)
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Sell 1 call contract per 100 shares owned (100% coverage)'

issues.title: Dividend impact on roll decision not addressed
issues.description: Dividends affect call pricing and assignment risk
issues.suggested_fix: Add: 'Evaluate early assignment risk when ex-dividend date falls before expiration. Roll to post-dividend expiration if assignment risk high'

issues.title: Odd lot handling not specified
issues.description: Position sizes not divisible by 100 shares - handling not addressed
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Round down to nearest 100 shares for option coverage. Odd lots held uncovered or excluded from strategy'

issues.title: Corporate action handling not specified
issues.description: Stock splits, mergers, spinoffs affect options - adjustments not specified
issues.suggested_fix: Add: 'Corporate actions: Follow OCC adjustment memos for option contract adjustments. Reestablish standard contracts at next expiration'
